hero.title: Legal Information
hero.subtitle: Important legal information about using our website and visiting Kaluwala.

content.heading: Environmental Responsibility
content.text: Visitors are expected to respect the natural environment of Kaluwala. This includes not littering, not disturbing wildlife, staying on designated paths, and following Leave No Trace principles.

content.heading: Cultural Sensitivity
content.text: Please respect local customs, traditions, and religious practices. When visiting the Kalusidh Temple or interacting with locals, dress modestly and behave respectfully.

content.heading: Safety Guidelines
content.text: Visitors participate in activities at their own risk. We recommend informing others of your travel plans, carrying emergency contacts, and following safety guidelines provided by local guides.

content.heading: Photography
content.text: While photography is encouraged to capture Kaluwala's beauty, please ask permission before photographing people and respect any restrictions around religious sites.

content.heading: Legal Inquiries
content.text: For questions about these legal terms or to report violations, please contact us at legal@kaluwala.in or write to us at Kaluwala Village, Tehri Garhwal District, Uttarakhand, India - 249145.

content.heading: Governing Law
content.text: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that state or location.
